name: Are N' Gee
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, the theme was "Roll of the Dice".

You're Dan the Die. Your goal? Apply to D20 University, of course! You need to collect as many coins as you can to use for your application. Dan can double jump, fly through the air and bounce, and he can occasionally switch things up too. High and low gravity, flying capabilities, you name it.

RESOURCES I DIDN'T MAKE:

Retro Computer Font by Petyka

https://www.dafont.com/retro-computer.font?text=Do+you+like+hurting+other+people...

Halo Reach Sound Samples (Bungie)

The Windows downloadable build will lock your cursor in the window during gameplay!

If you are on a mobile device, make sure to enable "MOBILE MODE" on the title screen, as it will not work without it!
